name: Hypergranular
description:
An adventure game featuring a slime and a gazer as the protagonists,  with an alternating storyline featuring the traditional warriors of light, being the Floral Squad, a flower-themed band of mercenaries, racing their way to save the world by overthrowing the corrupted guardian of the Solid Steel crystal, the Irongiant.
This game is still a prototype used for the adventure game jam, and is planned to be continued in the future, completing the 4 crystals of matter and leads to the final boss, as well as exploring the characters more seriously.

I hope everyone enjoys this game as much as I enjoyed making it.
